scripts.build:app: docker build -t app -f app/Dockerfile app && echo 'Docker image for app successfully built'
scripts.build:auth: docker build -t auth -f auth/Dockerfile auth && echo 'Docker image for auth successfully built'
scripts.build:dashboard: docker build -t dashboard -f dashboard/Dockerfile dashboard && echo 'Docker image for dashboard successfully built'
scripts.build:converter: docker build -t converter -f converter/Dockerfile converter && echo 'Docker image for converter successfully built'
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:app" "npm run build:auth" "npm run build:converter" "npm run build:dashboard"
scripts.deploy: concurrently "npm run deploy:app" "npm run deploy:auth" "npm run deploy:converter" "npm run deploy:dashboard"
scripts.start: (minikube status > /dev/null || minikube start) && eval $(minikube docker-env) && npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.stop:kubernetes: concurrently "npm run stop:app" "npm run stop:auth" "npm run stop:converter" "npm run stop:dashboard"
scripts.stop:docker: docker rmi app:latest dashboard:latest converter:latest auth:latest 2> /dev/null
scripts.stop: npm run stop:kubernetes && npm run stop:docker
